summary: This is a Reuters news email from reporter Lawrence Delevingne summarizing financial industry news, including the retirement of hedge fund billionaire Glenn Dubin, who addresses his past ties to Jeffrey Epstein. The email contains multiple financial industry updates from January 2020.

persons.name: Glenn Dubin
persons.role: Hedge fund billionaire, co-founder of Highbridge
persons.context: He is retiring from running client money after 40 years and states his retirement was long planned and unrelated to his past ties with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as having past ties with Glenn Dubin, which Dubin addresses in relation to his retirement announcement.

persons.name: Lawrence Delevingne
persons.context: Author of the email newsletter summarizing financial news, including the item about Glenn Dubin's retirement.

persons.name: Bob Press
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of his firm TCA Global, whose returns are under SEC scrutiny.

persons.name: Ubben
persons.context: Mentioned as stepping back in a financial news summary.

persons.name: Rolet
persons.context: Mentioned as stepping down in a financial news summary.

persons.name: Rubenstein
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of Carlyle looking at 'cheap' energy assets.

persons.name: Scaramucci
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of Bloomberg being best to beat Trump.

persons.name: Rich Portogallo
persons.context: Mentioned as retiring in a financial news summary.

connections.description: The document references Dubin's 'past ties' with Epstein, which Dubin addresses when announcing his retirement.

events.title: Glenn Dubin announces retirement
events.description: Hedge fund billionaire Glenn Dubin retires from running client money after 40 years, stating the move was long planned and unrelated to his past ties with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: SEC probes TCA Global
events.description: The SEC is investigating private lender TCA Global over accounting questions regarding its record of 60 months of uninterrupted gains.

events.title: Davos coverage
events.description: Reuters provides full coverage of the World Economic Forum in Davos.

keyFacts: Glenn Dubin, a hedge fund billionaire and co-founder of Highbridge, retired from running client money in January 2020.
Dubin explicitly stated his retirement was 'long planned and unrelated to his past ties with Jeffrey Epstein.'
The document is a Reuters financial news email, showing public awareness and media coverage of the Epstein associations within the financial industry.
The SEC was investigating direct lending fund TCA Global over accounting questions at the time.
The email contains numerous other financial industry updates from January 2020, including executive moves and regulatory developments.
